Timeline.cardDetailedText: Conducted cryptographic research and built simulations for hard disks for my internship.
Started my double degree program in Computer Science and Mathematics at NUS.
Did research on using A.I and Machine Learning to optimise SAT Solver performances on cryptographic instances.
Served my 2 years of National Service as an Air Force Technician (F16) and Chief Controller of Flight. ORD-ed as 3SG.
Did development of a new cryptographic module for the Montgomery Class of Elliptic Curves.
Completed my Pre-University (JC) education here at VJC. I was in the 2nd batch of Further Mathematics students after its re-introduction.
